body_text:
What are the 9 mountains and 8 seas? So we have all seen Zoro boast.
Now it made me wonder, which mountains and what seas was he referring to?

Why is All Blue not part of the 8 Seas? While exploring this site, I came across this particular question: What are the 9 mountains and 8 seas? 
In the answers however, I did not see anyone mention All Blue. So my question is why is All Blue not a part of the 8 Seas that Zoro mentions?
